services.name: Launch
services.shortDescription: Embark on your entrepreneurial journey with Startup Movers by your side. We're more than just a compliance partner; we’re champions of your cause, turning visions into realities.
services.longDescription: Embark on your entrepreneurial journey with Startup Movers by your side. We redefine the launch phase, moving far beyond mere compliance to act as champions of your cause. Starting a business is complex, but our holistic "Launch" service simplifies the process, turning ambitious visions into operational realities swiftly and securely. We handle the critical initial setup—from selecting the ideal legal structure (like PLC or LLP) to securing necessary registrations and documentation. Our experts ensure you meet all regulatory requirements with zero stress, allowing you to focus purely on product development and market strategy. Partner with us to establish a strong, compliant, and scalable foundation for enduring success. We're the catalyst for your vision.
highlights: Holistic Startup Strategy: Beyond compliance, we help structure your entire initial business plan.
Legal Structure Selection: Expert guidance to choose the ideal entity (PLC, LLP, etc.) for growth and liability protection.
Rapid Registration & Setup: Streamlined process for quick DIN/DSC and incorporation filing.
Compliance Certainty: Zero-stress assurance that all initial regulatory hurdles are successfully cleared.
Vision-to-Reality Partner: We are champions dedicated to transforming your idea into a tangible, compliant business.

services.name: Private Limited Company
services.shortDescription: Private Limited Company (PLC) registration helps entrepreneurs form a company with limited liability, separate legal identity, and the ability to raise capital efficiently.
services.longDescription: Forming a Private Limited Company involves drafting a company name, preparing MOA and AOA, applying for DSC and DIN for directors, and filing incorporation forms with the Registrar of Companies. This structure allows you to limit liability, attract investors, and build credibility in the market. It is ideal for startups and businesses aiming for growth, ensuring proper compliance with corporate laws while providing flexibility in ownership and management.
highlights: Legal Structure Selection: Expert guidance to choose the ideal entity (PLC, LLP, etc.) for growth and liability protection.

services.name: Limited Liability Partnership LLP
services.shortDescription: LLP registration combines the benefits of a partnership and a company, offering limited liability to partners and simplified compliance.
services.longDescription: Limited Liability Partnership (LLP) registration is suited for professionals and small businesses. It provides a legal entity separate from its partners, limiting personal liability. The process includes obtaining DSCs, DINs, naming the LLP, filing incorporation forms with the MCA, and executing the LLP agreement. LLPs enjoy operational flexibility, simplified taxation, and credibility with clients. This structure ensures both partners are protected from business debts while maintaining an easy governance model compared to traditional companies.

services.name: One Person Company OPC
services.shortDescription: OPC allows a single entrepreneur to start a company with limited liability and full control over management.
services.longDescription: OPC registration enables a sole entrepreneur to create a company with limited liability, combining the benefits of a private company with the simplicity of sole proprietorship. The registration process includes obtaining DSC, DIN, reserving a unique company name, and filing incorporation documents with the Registrar of Companies. OPCs are ideal for solo entrepreneurs looking for a formal business structure, easier access to funding, and compliance advantages. This structure allows scaling the business later by converting to a private limited company while protecting personal assets.
highlights: Rapid Registration & Setup: Streamlined process for quick DIN/DSC and incorporation filing.

services.name: Foreign Subsidiary
services.shortDescription: A Foreign Subsidiary registration allows international companies to establish an Indian legal entity for business operations.
services.longDescription: Establishing a Foreign Subsidiary in India requires compliance with the Companies Act and RBI regulations. The process includes approval of the company name, filing incorporation forms with the Registrar of Companies, and meeting foreign investment regulations. This structure allows foreign companies to operate locally, manage finances efficiently, comply with Indian laws, and expand market presence. It provides limited liability protection and credibility among local clients and partners.

services.name: Section 8 Company
services.shortDescription: Section 8 Company registration helps create non-profit organizations with legal status and credibility.
services.longDescription: Section 8 Company registration is designed for charitable, social, or non-profit initiatives. It involves drafting MOA and AOA, applying for DSC and DIN for directors, obtaining licenses under Section 8 of the Companies Act, and filing incorporation documents with the Registrar of Companies. This structure allows the organization to operate legally, receive donations, enjoy tax exemptions, and demonstrate transparency and credibility to stakeholders while pursuing non-profit objectives.
highlights: Compliance Certainty: Zero-stress assurance that all initial regulatory hurdles are successfully cleared.

services.name: Partnership Registration
services.shortDescription: Partnership registration formalizes a business partnership, providing legal recognition and clarity in roles.
services.longDescription: Registering a partnership involves drafting a partnership deed outlining rights, responsibilities, profit sharing, and management roles among partners. Filing the deed with the Registrar of Firms ensures legal recognition and enables the partnership to operate formally. Registration provides credibility, protects partners’ interests, facilitates opening business accounts, and helps resolve disputes efficiently. This process ensures structured governance and smooth operation of the partnership business.

services.name: Sole Propreitorship
services.shortDescription: Sole proprietorship registration allows an individual to operate a business with minimal compliance and full control.
services.longDescription: A sole proprietorship is the simplest form of business registration, where a single owner manages all operations. Registration is optional but can include GST, local licenses, or trade permits. This structure offers full control, quick setup, and minimal compliance requirements. It is ideal for small businesses or startups, enabling the proprietor to handle operations, finances, and taxation while benefiting from direct decision-making and easy management of business activities.
highlights: Vision-to-Reality Partner: We are champions dedicated to transforming your idea into a tangible, compliant business.

services.name: GST Registration
services.shortDescription: GST Registration helps businesses comply with tax laws and claim input credits efficiently.
services.longDescription: GST Registration involves obtaining a unique GSTIN, understanding applicable tax rates, and filing regular returns to the government. Compliance ensures businesses can legally charge and collect GST, claim input tax credits, and avoid penalties. This process is crucial for eCommerce sellers, enabling smooth financial operations, proper accounting, and maintaining legal and tax compliance across multiple states and marketplaces. Professional guidance ensures timely filing, reconciliation, and accurate tax reporting.

services.name: Startup India Recognition
services.shortDescription: Startup India Recognition provides benefits and incentives to registered startups under government schemes.
services.longDescription: Obtaining Startup India Recognition involves applying through the official portal, providing business details, innovation descriptions, and incorporation documents. Recognized startups gain access to government benefits such as tax exemptions, funding support, easier compliance procedures, and mentorship opportunities. This status increases credibility with investors, partners, and customers, helping the startup grow efficiently while enjoying regulatory and financial support.

services.name: MSME Registrations
services.shortDescription: MSME registration enables small businesses to access government schemes and financial benefits.
services.longDescription: MSME Registration involves submitting business details to the Udyam portal, including ownership, activity, and investment information. Once registered, businesses can avail benefits like easier access to loans, subsidies, tax incentives, and credit support. The process ensures legal recognition, enhances credibility with clients and lenders, and provides support for growth, technology adoption, and competitive advantage in the market.

services.name: PF Registration
services.shortDescription: PF registration ensures employee provident fund contributions are compliant and secure.
services.longDescription: PF registration involves enrolling the business with the Employees' Provident Fund Organization (EPFO), maintaining employee records, contributing monthly to the fund, and filing returns. This ensures employees receive retirement benefits, tax savings, and social security while the employer maintains compliance with labor laws. Professional handling guarantees accurate calculations, timely deposits, and adherence to statutory requirements, providing financial security and trust for employees.

services.name: ESIC Registration
services.shortDescription: PF registration ensures employee provident fund contributions are compliant and secure.
services.longDescription: ESIC registration involves applying to the Employees' State Insurance Corporation, submitting employee and business details, contributing monthly premiums, and filing returns. This enables employees to access health and social security benefits such as medical care, maternity, and sickness allowances. Businesses comply with labor laws and enhance employee satisfaction and retention by providing statutory benefits efficiently through structured processes and regular reporting.

services.name: Shop & Establishment Registration
services.shortDescription: Shop & Establishment registration legally recognizes a business for commercial operations.
services.longDescription: Registration under the Shops & Establishment Act involves submitting business details, owner information, and operational hours to the local municipal authority. Once registered, the business complies with labor laws, maintains proper employee records, and avoids legal penalties. This formal recognition helps eCommerce and retail operations establish credibility, manage workforce effectively, and ensures adherence to statutory requirements for smooth commercial functioning.

services.name: Professional Tax
services.shortDescription: Professional Tax registration ensures proper tax deduction for employees according to state laws.
services.longDescription: Professional Tax registration involves enrolling the business under the relevant state authority, calculating monthly deductions from employees' salaries, submitting returns, and depositing taxes. Compliance ensures employees' professional tax obligations are met, avoiding penalties, and maintaining smooth payroll management. Businesses benefit from structured deduction processes and accurate reporting, supporting statutory compliance and operational efficiency.

services.name: Import Export Code (IEC) registration involves applying to the Directorate General of Foreign Trade with business details, bank account information, and supporting documents. IEC is required for exporting and importing goods and services. Registration enables smooth customs clearance, access to government incentives, compliance with trade regulations, and legal recognition for international operations. This process ensures hassle-free cross-border transactions and smooth business expansion globally.
services.shortDescription: FSSAI registration certifies food businesses to comply with safety and hygiene standards.
services.longDescription: FSSAI Registration involves applying through the Food Safety Authority, submitting business and product details, meeting hygiene and operational standards, and obtaining the license. This certification ensures food safety, builds customer trust, and allows legal operation. Compliance helps avoid penalties, ensures periodic inspections, and facilitates expansion into multiple regions or eCommerce platforms, establishing credibility and adherence to food regulations.

services.name: Import Export Code
services.shortDescription: IEC registration is mandatory for businesses engaging in international trade.
services.longDescription: Import Export Code (IEC) registration involves applying to the Directorate General of Foreign Trade with business details, bank account information, and supporting documents. IEC is required for exporting and importing goods and services. Registration enables smooth customs clearance, access to government incentives, compliance with trade regulations, and legal recognition for international operations. This process ensures hassle-free cross-border transactions and smooth business expansion globally.

services.name: Trademark Registration
services.shortDescription: Secure your brand identity and distinguish your products or services legally.
services.longDescription: Trademark registration provides legal protection for your brand name, logo, or slogan, preventing unauthorized use by competitors. The process involves conducting a comprehensive search, preparing and filing the application with the Trade Marks Registry, responding to official objections (if any), and finally, securing the registration certificate. A registered trademark is a valuable asset that offers exclusive rights across India, enhancing brand equity, building consumer trust, and enabling you to take legal action against infringement. It is a critical step for any business focused on long-term growth and brand recognition.
highlights: Exclusive brand rights; Legal protection from infringement; Increased brand equity; National validity.

services.name: Operate
services.shortDescription: Channel your energy into growth while we manage the intricacies of operational efficiency. At Startup Movers, our approach is tailored for startups, ensuring compliance is straightforward and aligned with your growth trajectory.

services.name: Accounting & Book Keeping
services.shortDescription: Systematic management of all financial records to ensure compliance and accurate reporting.
services.longDescription: Professional Accounting and Book Keeping services involve recording all financial transactions, maintaining ledgers, reconciling bank statements, managing accounts payable and receivable, and preparing periodic financial statements (Profit & Loss, Balance Sheet). Our services ensure your records are accurate, up-to-date, and fully compliant with generally accepted accounting principles (GAAP). This service is essential for effective financial analysis, budgeting, managing cash flow, and providing accurate data needed for tax filings and investor reporting.
highlights: Accurate financial records; Statutory compliance; Cash flow visibility; Audit readiness.

services.name: GST Filings
services.shortDescription: Timely and accurate filing of Goods and Services Tax returns to ensure compliance and avoid penalties.
services.longDescription: GST Filings services cover the preparation and submission of various mandated GST returns (e.g., GSTR-1, GSTR-3B, annual returns) based on your business transactions. This involves meticulous reconciliation of sales and purchase data, proper classification of goods and services, and correct calculation of tax liabilities and input tax credits (ITC). Outsourcing this ensures adherence to frequent regulatory deadlines, minimizes the risk of compliance errors, and maximizes eligible ITC claims, helping you avoid penalties and maintain a clean compliance record with the tax authorities.
highlights: Penalty avoidance; Maximized Input Tax Credit (ITC); Timely submission; Error-free compliance.

services.name: TDS / With Holding Tax
services.shortDescription: Comprehensive management and deposit of Tax Deducted at Source (TDS) and related filings.
services.longDescription: This service covers the statutory requirements of TDS/TCS (Tax Collected at Source) compliance, including calculating the correct amount to be withheld, timely deposit of the tax with the government, and filing of quarterly TDS returns (e.g., Form 24Q, 26Q). We manage the issuance of TDS certificates (Form 16/16A) to deductees. Proper management of TDS is crucial for businesses to avoid penalties and interest, ensuring they fulfill their obligations as a tax deductor/collector under the Income Tax Act.
highlights: Statutory compliance; Accurate calculation; Timely deposits; Error-free return filing.

services.name: Income Tax Returns
services.shortDescription: Expert preparation and filing of corporate and individual income tax returns for full compliance.
services.longDescription: Income Tax Return (ITR) filing involves calculating taxable income, claiming all eligible deductions and exemptions, and submitting the appropriate ITR form (e.g., ITR-6 for companies) to the Income Tax Department. Our service ensures maximum tax efficiency, minimizes tax liability within legal bounds, and guarantees timely filing to avoid penalties. This is critical for maintaining financial compliance, facilitating loan applications, and completing business audits.
highlights: Optimized tax liability; Maximum deductions/exemptions; Penalty avoidance; Quick processing.

services.name: Grow
services.shortDescription: We're committed to propelling startups towards enduring success. Let's navigate the growth journey together, ensuring your rise is both strategic and sustainable.
